blog.name: laireshi
blog.description: I write fics.

title: Lipstick on the glass
body:
Ults Tony Stark/616 Tony Stark

Summary:

“Come here, darling,” Tony murmurs, and his other self leans in, pupils already blown wide when Tony grabs him by chin to hold his face steady.

They’re not even undressed yet, but this other Tony does react to commands ever so nicely. Or maybe it’s just that he doesn’t have to hide this terrible emptiness and darkness within him when next to Tony.

Tony smiles and touches the tip of the lipstick to his other self’s upper lip.

I blame @hellogarbagetime for every single word of this.

read on ao3

tags: cute domestic life after infinity war
body:
okay, but just imagine

peter babysitting for tony and pepper and doing sweet tricks for their kid like hanging from the ceiling while playing peek-a-boo or showing them how to use the webshooters or singing them soft songs in spanish

and then imagine tony and pepper coming home late from dinner and seeing their kid who’s not really their kid asleep and cuddled with their actual kid

and just feeling finally at peace now that the war is over.

summary: omg your costco fic got me thinking about something; if that is how reacted when he saw a giant teddy bear, imagine him at a dog...
question: omg your costco fic got me thinking about something; if that is how reacted when he saw a giant teddy bear, imagine him at a dog rescue center
answer:
note: this was requested when fic requests were open, they are now CLOSED.

(sort-of-prequel to this fic I wrote for steve’s 100th birthday)

“Hi, puppy,” Tony coos, scratching at the dog’s chin. It’s an energetic little pup, wagging its tail so hard it’s about to fall over. Tony thinks it’d suit Steve perfectly. “Oh, you’re such a good boy, aren’t you? Such a good boy.”

There are plenty of good dogs here, of course; this is one of the biggest rescue centers in New York City, and the largest in Brooklyn. The kennels are filled with lovely, lively pups, but this particular one caught Tony’s eye as soon as he spotted it. It just seemed so - desperate. So sweet, and so enthusiastic, and so lonely in its little concrete cage.

“This is one of our older pups,” the volunteer behind Tony says, and it just makes Tony want him more. “He’s almost a year old, been here for most of that time.”

“He’s beautiful,” Tony says, scratching around the dog’s chest and belly as it continues to wag. “You’re definitely coming home with me. Yeah, that’s right, welcome to the billionaire lifestyle, I promise you’ll love it.”

The dog licks a stripe up Tony’s palm as if in agreement, and the volunteer laughs. “That’s great to hear,” she says. “I’ve always had a soft spot for Dodger, I’m happy he’s getting such a great home.”

“Wait, what?” Tony asks, turning to face the woman. The dog doesn’t like the loss of attention and circles Tony, whining until Tony starts scratching behind his ears again. “Is his name Dodger?”

“Yes,” the volunteer says, “But don’t worry, you can rename him if you want -”

“No,” Tony says, feeling a smile spread across his cheeks as he looks back down in the dog in his arms. If he hadn’t already known, this would have decided it for him. “No, it’s perfect.”

Dodger slobbers over Tony’s seats the whole ride home, pressing his wet little nose up against the glass, and all Tony can think is that Steve is going to absolutely adore him.

blog.name: sansatsarks
blog.title: cacoethes
blog.description: noun. a strong urge to do something inadvisable

tags: i cant for the life of me find the post
will link it when i do
summary: sos there’s this post that’s circulating about justin hammer (or SOMEONE) hacking into jarvis’/friday’s archives and leaking...
body:
sos there’s this post that’s circulating about justin hammer (or SOMEONE) hacking into jarvis’/friday’s archives and leaking footage of the avengers’ daily lives in hopes of humiliating them into hiding nor whatever and it backfiring and the internet turning clips of the videos into compilations on youtube and even tho i can’t find the original post i want to add some fun compilation titles to the list:

  • stark intern peter parker serenades the avengers with abba songs for ten minutes
  • steve rogers will fight ANYTHING (compilation)
  • thor trolling everyone for fifteen minutes
  • princess shuri of wakanda making tony stark feel stupid for five minutes
  • HAWKEYE RUNNING INTO WALLS COMPILATION
  • Loki Is Chaotic Neutral (PROOF!!!)
  • TOP 10 BEST Falcon & Winter Soldier Arguments
  • black widow making me gay(er) compilation
  • Spider-Man Doesn’t Know His Own Strength
  • king t’challa’s guard has had Enough of these White Men
  • bruce banner smokes a lot of weed
  • Doctor Strange and Tony Stark are THE SAME PERSON
  • tony stark needs a nap

reblog.comment:
sos there’s this post that’s circulating about justin hammer (or SOMEONE) hacking into jarvis’/friday’s archives and leaking footage of the avengers’ daily lives in hopes of humiliating them into hiding nor whatever and it backfiring and the internet turning clips of the videos into compilations on youtube and even tho i can’t find the original post i want to add some fun compilation titles to the list:

blog.name: x-phaet-x

blog.description: oof?

title: Tony Stark.
body:
Tony Stark not having real friends. Tony Stark being used because of his name and his money.

Tony Stark building up this facade that he’s so tough and strong and emotionless because he’s terrified of being hurt.

Tony Stark being overly protective of the people he loves/are his real friends because he can’t lose them.

Tony Stark and what he felt when Steve hurt him. The fact that he wouldn’t do the same.

title: Home for the Holidays

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QXAUkr

by antigrav_vector

The semester is drawing to a close and Christmas is looming. Tony’s got to go home for the holidays, and he’s not sure it won’t be a disaster… but it could be worse.

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: You're Hired
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2AcKqdU

by Zeyra

Peter Park is in need of a new dad. The current one is abusing him, and that’s not alright. So he decides to hire a new one. When he witnesses a man miss his train and melt down in the middle of a train station, he decides to hire him.

(short extract)

“Father.” Deadpans the boy. He needs the man to understand just how serious he is. “I need a new dad, and you look nice.”

The man’s smile is wiped away in an instant, replaced by a look of pure bafflement.

“I- What ? I’m a complete stranger !! What the hell ?”

Words: 754, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Drama, Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Emotional/Psychological Abuse, Child Abuse


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2AcKqdU

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Superhero Business
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Adikiu

by SkyGiantz

“Have you filled out the proper forms?” Ken asks, glaring back at Stark. He hears Stark sigh, and look around. “You can’t just take one of the students, Mr. Stark. You have to fill out the release form, first.”

Release form? And, wait? You said my name. You know who I am and you’re still giving me a hard time about taking the kid?” Stark shakes his head. “Usually, I have parents throwing their kids at me.”

“Release form.” Ken repeats, taking a step forward. “Or, no student.”

Or: Ken deals with self-entitled billionaire, Tony Stark, and reminisces about when students would just start fights and beat each other up.

Words: 3148, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Principal Morita (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Drabble, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, sort of, mostly he just likes to embarrass Peter, Ken is tired of Tony’s shit, Peter is just going along with it


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Adikiu
